meanings.definition: A woman who is giving birth for the first time.
meanings.sent1: The hospital has a special program for primiparas to provide support during their first childbirth.
meanings.sent2: The primiparas in the maternity ward were excited and nervous about the upcoming delivery.
meanings.sent3: The primiparas at the prenatal class shared stories and tips with each other.
meanings.sent4: She felt like a primiparas in a new world when she entered the labor room.
meanings.sent5: The primiparas' joy and anxiety were palpable in the delivery room.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to a woman who is giving birth for the first time.
meanings.sent1: The primiparas clinic offers specialized care for first-time expectant mothers.
meanings.sent2: Her primiparas experience was both exciting and overwhelming.
meanings.sent3: The primiparas party was filled with laughter and baby shower games.
meanings.sent4: The primiparas journey into motherhood was a beautiful beginning.
